'''Eärien''' was the daughter of [[Elendil]], thus sister to [[Isildur]], and an apprentice of the [[Builder's Guild]] in [[Númenor]]. Eärien was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]] and is portrayed by [[Ema Horvath]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9788618/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDB|accessed=31 July 2022}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Eärien'' ("daughter of the sea") is made from the [[Quenya]] word ''[[eär]]'' ("sea"), and the ending ''[[-ien]]'' ("daughter").
